name: eggd_vcf_handler_for_uranus
title: eggd_vcf_handler_for_uranus
summary: Annotates and filters VCF files for Uranus

inputSpec.name: bed
inputSpec.label: bed file used to define regions of interest
inputSpec.help: The bed file will be used to remove variants outside the regions of interest

inputSpec.name: mutect2_fasta
inputSpec.label: FASTA for bcftools to split multiallelics
inputSpec.help: Should be equivalent FASTA as used by mutect2

inputSpec.name: mutect2_fai
inputSpec.label: mutect2 fai index
inputSpec.help: Should be equivalent fai index as used by mutect2

inputSpec.name: vep_tarball
inputSpec.label: vep docker and annotation sources
inputSpec.help: tarball containing VEP docker image, plugins and annotation sources

outputSpec.name: allgenes_filtered_vcf
outputSpec.label: Filtered and annotated VCF for all panel genes
outputSpec.help: VCF that has been filtered and annotated using bedtools, bcftools and VEP

outputSpec.name: lymphoid_filtered_vcf
outputSpec.label: Filtered and annotated VCF for lymphoid panel genes
outputSpec.help: VCF that has been filtered and annotated using bedtools, bcftools and VEP

outputSpec.name: myeloid_filtered_vcf
outputSpec.label: Filtered and annotated VCF for myeloid panel genes
outputSpec.help: VCF that has been filtered and annotated using bedtools, bcftools and VEP

outputSpec.name: cll_filtered_vcf
outputSpec.label: Filtered and annotated VCF for myeloid panel genes
outputSpec.help: VCF that has been filtered and annotated using bedtools, bcftools and VEP

outputSpec.name: tp53_filtered_vcf
outputSpec.label: Filtered and annotated VCF for myeloid panel genes
outputSpec.help: VCF that has been filtered and annotated using bedtools, bcftools and VEP

outputSpec.name: lgl_filtered_vcf
outputSpec.label: Filtered and annotated VCF for myeloid panel genes
outputSpec.help: VCF that has been filtered and annotated using bedtools, bcftools and VEP

outputSpec.name: hcl_filtered_vcf
outputSpec.label: Filtered and annotated VCF for myeloid panel genes
outputSpec.help: VCF that has been filtered and annotated using bedtools, bcftools and VEP

outputSpec.name: lpl_filtered_vcf
outputSpec.label: Filtered and annotated VCF for myeloid panel genes
outputSpec.help: VCF that has been filtered and annotated using bedtools, bcftools and VEP

outputSpec.name: text_report
outputSpec.label: Text variant report from all genes
outputSpec.help: Text (tsv) list of variants from all genes

outputSpec.name: excel_report
outputSpec.label: Excel variant report for scientists
outputSpec.help: Excel workbook with variants for each panel in separate sheets

upstreamProjects.name: bedtools
upstreamProjects.author: Quinlan Laboratory at the University of Virginia

details.whatsNew:
* 2.0.0 New panels; VEP input; previous counts
 * 1.5.7 Add CADD and ClinVar annotation
 * 1.5.3 Added excel workbook output with variants for each panel in separate sheets, removed synonymous variant filter, prefix exon numbers with the word exon to overcome excel, further report_text formatting
 * 1.4.12 Allele fraction in tsv variantlist
 * 1.4.10 Make mark-section and mark-success executable in github
 * 1.4.9 Minor changed to report_text field in tsv, and brings back gnomad AF in tsv(!)
 * 1.4.8 (Deprecated) Adds AF column to text report
 * 1.4.4 (Deprecated) Uses app assets
 * 1.3.4 (Deprecated) Creates text report
 * 1.2.10 (Deprecated) Creates BSVI VCF
 * 1.1.9 (Deprecated) With VEP
 * 1.0.0 (Deprecated) Initial app
